str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.
An adversary, Satan. Of Chaldee origin corresponding to ma'bad; the accuser, i.e. The devil.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To throw (cast, put) out; I banish; I bring forth, produce. From ek and ballo; to eject.
An adversary, Satan. Of Chaldee origin corresponding to ma'bad; the accuser, i.e. The devil.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From meros; to part, i.e. to apportion, bestow, share, or to disunite, differ.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular

str2: Adverb from the base of pou; an interrogative particle of manner; in what way?; also as exclamation, how much!
Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From basileus; properly, royalty, i.e. rule, or a realm.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary stao stah'-o; to stand, used in various applications.
